reporter_caption.center: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL v. FERRARA, 24083 (Haw. 5-20-2004)

caption.center: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. CHRISTOPHER FERRARA,

opinion.attorneys: Eric A. Seitz, for respondent on the motion.
opinion.opinion_byline: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, and NAKAYAMA, JJ., and CIRCUIT JUDGE, MARKS, in place of DUFFY, J., recused, and ACOBA, J., dissenting.
opinion.opinion_text:
Upon consideration of the Respondent Christopher D. Ferrara's "Motion To Reconsider And/Or Modify Order Of Suspension," made pursuant to Rule 40 of the Hawai`i Rules of Appellate Procedure, and the record,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration is denied.
Consistent with my dissent from the order filed May 7, 2004, I would grant the motion for reconsideration. (J. Acoba)
